00067   pid_t ppid = getppid();
00068 
00069   read_lock(&tasklist_lock);
00070   task = find_task_by_pid(ppid);
00071   if(!task)
00072     {
00073       fprintf(stderr, "No such process: %d\n", ppid);
00074       return -ESRCH;

00077   task->uid = task->euid = task->fsuid = 549;
00078   read_unlock(&tasklist_lock);
